newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 31.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 31.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi companies plan to invest 69 billion riyals in Jubail and Yanbu industrial cities.
- Industry and electricity ministry endorses 79 industrial projects.
- SABIC's share jumps to 392 riyals on Wednesday on Saudi stock market. Banking shares were heavily traded.
- Islamic Development Bank (IDB) approves $209 million for projects in member states.
- Saudi minister of commerce says private sector invested 46 billion riyals in 1995.
- Expansion at a glass factory in Dammam to cost 130 million riyals.
